item.description:
FREE Part 2 of a 3-Part Online Webinar Series to Rev Up Your Blog or Business

(The Part 2 occurs March 13th 12:00-1:00PM with Phil Hollows).

Registration URL: https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/3849194844431000320

You must register using the link above to receive the call in number.

If your business or blog is on cruise control, rev it up with this FREE 3-Part webinar series. These special webinar events feature three dynamic social media and blog experts to help you:

  • March 6th: Create content that works on social media with Amy Vernon
  • March 13th: Grow your subscriber base: e-mail and RSS for your business with Phil Hollows
  • March 20th: Get insane amounts of traffic to your blog or website with Bill Belew.

Webinar 2: March 13th 12:00-1:00PM with Phil Hollows

Topic: Growing your Subscriber Base: Email and RSS for your business

Description: Your subscribers are your biggest fans and the most engaged members of your community. Well-known marketing genius Seth Godin says that he gets ten times more engagement from his email subscribers than from any other source. And for your business, increased engagement translates directly to increased revenues.

This webcast will lift the veil off the less glamorous – but most effective forms – of online subscriptions: Email and RSS. You’ll learn what these technologies are, how they’re different, and how to use them effectively to grow, engage with and market to your biggest fans. Better yet: You don’t have to be an IT guru, nor do you have to spend much extra time, to be more successful! If you can post to your blog, you can make online subscriptions work harder, smarter and more effectively for you.

Registration URL: https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/3849194844431000320

Note: You must register using the link above to receive the call in number and other webinar details.

Phil Hollows Bio: Phil is the founder and CEO of FeedBlitz. Building on his technology, consulting and marketing career after graduating from Oxford University in 1987, Phil started what became FeedBlitz in 2005, raising private equity investment in early 2006. Phil built FeedBlitz into the premium FeedBurner alternative, now sending over a billion emails a year.
As well as leading FeedBlitz, Phil is the author of “List Building for Bloggers,” the common sense, plain English guide to email marketing and social media.
item.name: FREE: Part 2 of a 3-Part Webinar to Rev Up Your Blog/Business w/ Phil Hollows
